item.title: Zululand and the Zulus
item.scopeAndContent: [Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: A digital copy of the book Zululand and the Zulus: their history, beliefs, customs, military system, home life, legends, etc., etc., and missions to them . By J. A. Farrer. Second Edition. London: Kerby & Endean, 190 Oxford Street. 1879.]
